com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs

Class HcsIdentityNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs.HcsIdentityNetwork

  • public final class HcsIdentityNetwork
extends java.lang.Object
    Appnet's identity network based on Hedera HCS DID method specification.

    • Method Detail

      • fromAddressBook

        public static HcsIdentityNetwork fromAddressBook(HederaNetwork network,
                                                 AddressBook addressBook)
        Instantiates existing identity network from a provided address book.
        Parameters:
        network - The Hedera network.
        addressBook - The AddressBook of the identity network.
        Returns:
        The identity network instance.

      • fromAddressBookFile

        public static HcsIdentityNetwork fromAddressBookFile(com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.Client client,
                                                     HederaNetwork network,
                                                     com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.file.FileId addressBookFileId,
                                                     com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.Hbar maxQueryPayment)
                                              throws com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.HederaNetworkException,
                                                     com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.HederaStatusException
        Instantiates existing identity network using an address book file read from Hedera File Service.
        Parameters:
        client - The Hedera network client.
        network - The Hedera network.
        addressBookFileId - The FileID of AddressBook file stored on Hedera File Service.
        maxQueryPayment - Maximum HBAR payment for querying the address book file content.
        Returns:
        The identity network instance.
        Throws:
        com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.HederaStatusException - In case querying Hedera File Service fails.
        com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.HederaNetworkException - In case of querying Hedera File Service fails due to transport calls.

      • fromHcsDid

        public static HcsIdentityNetwork fromHcsDid(com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.Client client,
                                            HcsDid hcsDid,
                                            com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.Hbar maxQueryPayment)
                                     throws com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.HederaNetworkException,
                                            com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.HederaStatusException
        Instantiates existing identity network using a DID generated for this network.
        Parameters:
        client - The Hedera network client.
        hcsDid - The Hedera HCS DID.
        maxQueryPayment - Maximum HBAR payment for querying the address book file content.
        Returns:
        The identity network instance.
        Throws:
        com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.HederaStatusException - In case querying Hedera File Service fails.
        com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.HederaNetworkException - In case of querying Hedera File Service fails due to transport calls.

        public HcsDid generateDid(boolean withTid)
        Generates a new DID and it's root key.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • generateDid

        public HcsDid generateDid(com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.crypto.ed25519.Ed25519PublicKey publicKey,
                          boolean withTid)
        Generates a new DID from the given public DID root key.
        Parameters:
        publicKey - A DID root key.
        withTid - Indicates if DID topic ID should be added to the DID as tid parameter.
        Returns:
        A newly generated DID.

      • generateDid

        public HcsDid generateDid(java.security.SecureRandom secureRandom,
                          boolean withTid)
        Generates a new DID and it's root key using a cryptographically strong random number generator.
        Parameters:
        secureRandom - Cryptographically strong random number generator.
        withTid - Indicates if DID topic ID should be added to the DID as tid parameter.
        Returns:
        Generated HcsDid with it's private DID root key.

      • getVcStatusResolver

        public HcsVcStatusResolver getVcStatusResolver(java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,java.util.Collection<com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.crypto.ed25519.Ed25519PublicKey>> publicKeysProvider)
        Returns a VC status resolver for this network. Resolver will validate signatures of topic messages against public keys supplied by the given provider.
        Parameters:
        publicKeysProvider - Provider of a public keys acceptable for a given VC hash.
        Returns:
        The VC status resolver for this network.

      • getVcTopicListener

        Returns a VC topic listener for this network. This listener will validate signatures of topic messages against public keys supplied by the given provider.
        Parameters:
        publicKeysProvider - Provider of a public keys acceptable for a given VC hash.
        Returns:
        The VC topic listener.
